Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-20328 affecting package clamav for versions less than 0.105.2-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-20328 affecting package clamav for versions less than 0.105.2-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package clamav is earlier than 0.105.2-5, affected by CVE-2024-20328
